infoHouse: Gryffindor was founded by Godric Gryffindor, who valued bravery, daring, nerve, and chivalry in his students.
infoHouseBottom: Gryffindor house is known for producing courageous and daring witches and wizards, including Harry Potter, Hermione Granger, and Albus Dumbledore.

characterOne.name: Harry Potter
characterOne.info: The Boy Who Lived, known for his bravery, loyalty, and determination to fight against dark forces.

characterTwo.name: Hermione Granger
characterTwo.info: A brilliant witch whose courage, intelligence, and resourcefulness make her one of the most formidable students in Gryffindor.

characterThree.name: Ron Weasley
characterThree.info: Loyal and brave, Ron is Harry’s best friend and a true Gryffindor, often showing courage and determination in the face of danger.
